title: Intensive Short-Term Flipped Learning Course for Strengthening Mathematical Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: A blended environment combining smartphone-based pre-learning materials with offline problem-solving sessions, emphasizing practical mathematical applications for job seekers.

learning_goals: Learners can apply mathematical concepts (partial differentiation, matrix operations) to real-world problems with over 85% accuracy.
Learners can successfully present complex mathematical problem-solving strategies three or more times through peer feedback and instructor coaching.
Learners complete over 90% of pre-learning video content and achieve over 70 points on online quizzes.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
